{{cln|csb|cardinal numbers}} [[one]] ---- ==Polish== {{cardinalbox|pl|0|1|2|zero|dwa|ord=pierwszy|coll=jeden}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|pl|sla-pro|*edinъ}}, ultimately from {{der|pl|ine-pro|*óynos||one, single}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{pl-IPA}} * {{audio|pl|pl-jeden.ogg|audio}} ===Numeral=== {{head|pl|numeral|g=m}} # [[one]] ====Usage notes==== * In composite numbers (''dwadzieścia jeden'', ''trzydzieści jeden'', ''czterdzieści jeden'', etc.), ''jeden'' is indeclinable. Thus: :: ''dwudziestu jeden ludzi'' = "twenty-one people" :: ''Ja tam zobaczyłem dwudziestu jeden ludzi'' = "I saw twenty-one people there" ====Declension==== {{pl-decl-adj|jeden|jedna|jedno|jedni|jedne|jednego|jednej|jednych|jednemu|jednym|jedną|jednym|jednymi}} ====Coordinate terms==== {{pl-cardinals}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:pl:WSJP}} * {{R:PWN}} [[Category:Polish cardinal numbers]] [[Category:Polish entries with audio links]] [[Category:pl:One]] ---- ==Slovak== {{cardinalbox|sk|0|1|2||dva|ord=prvý}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|sk|sla-pro|*edinъ}}, ultimately from {{der|sk|ine-pro|*óynos||one, single}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{sk-IPA}} ===Numeral=== {{head|sk|numeral|g=m}} # {{cln|sk|cardinal numbers}} [[one]] (1) ====Declension==== {{sk-decl-num1|jed}} ====Coordinate terms==== {{sk-cardinals}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:SDK}}
